name: Spot-Care
0:
”Alexa open spot care”
”Alexa ask spot care for today's event”
”Alexa use spot care and get the menu for today's breakfast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spot care
des:
The "Spot care" skill is an expert for help of Seniors living in lobby, gathering and dining areas, and other high traffic locations caregivers will be able to provide senior residents with seamless current notifications consistently. 

The user can say,-"Alexa, Open Spot Care", or "Alexa, ask Spot Care for today's menu".
For feedback and questions, please write to us at alexa@nectarspot.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
